pageProduct.name: Raw Essentials Anti Inflammatory Blend Loose Leaf Tea
pageProduct.description:
General Information

NATURAL PAIN RELIEF
DECREASE RECOVERY TIME
REDUCE MUSCLE INFLAMMATION

Tea that’s inspired by everyday moments, like your daily exercise.

This unique blend contains healing herbs known for their anti-inflammatory benefits.

It’s the perfect post-training ritual, designed to decrease your recovery time and reduce muscle inflammation.

Infused with echinacea and calendula, this tea stimulates your immune system and helps your body to heal. The white meadowsweet flowers smell as sweetly as their name implies, and produce a subtle, soothing, floral fragrance with every brew.

They contain salicylate compounds, effective in reducing discomfort and inflammation. Often used as an aspirin replacement for treating arthritis and other body aches and pains, this herbal mixture is a source of natural relief.

Ingredients

Liquorice, Echinacea, Plantain, Organic Calendula, Meadowsweet
